Branding @Pay

Posted on Jun 9, 2012 in Life | No Comments

@Pay is an amazing technology that should have existed years ago. They send money through email. It radically simplifies purchases, donations, political contributions and pooling money for causes. I was recently hired to help re-brand and launch this exciting start up. I encourage you to check them out at www.atpay.com and on twitter at @atpay
